!Trader Payel: Welcome, traveler! We Elves have lived in Innadril for many years. Have you heard of the legendary love between Roland Hunter, a knight of Innadril, and an Elf named Adrienne? Their story has been fodder for bards and troubadours since the day of their wedding. You see befor you relics from their time.
